resources.string: Where is BeachBox Smart Boxing Studio and when is it open?
Can I use this app outside of the studio?
Of course. if you have a place to attach your phone to a punching bag, just stick it or put it in to a pouch on the bag, it will calculate your score the same as you would in the studio
A group of seniors from NJIT
Who founded BeachBox Smart Boxing Studio?
Wayne Strobel founded BeachBox Smart Boxing Studio early January 2018 to create not a gym, but a lifestyle.
What should I do after I workout in the studio?

After an exhausting hour or so of working out in the studio, it is a great idea to enjoy the amazing and relaxing Cryolete next door, which Wayne Strobel founded for those who need a place to relax and rejuvenate.
